title: NFL Schedule Starts Being Revealed
description:
Laura and the NFL Live Crew discuss the biggest concerns on the Packers’ roster, which team has a better offense; the Bears or the Lions, how Yannick Ngakoue’s addition affects the Colt’s defense, how to defend QBs in the AFC North, and revenge games they’re looking forward to. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Concerns on the Packers' Roster and Defending QBs in the AFC North
